amendment.purpose: An amendment to the amendment to allow TV Marti broadcasting to Cuba only if the March 1995 Office of Cuba Broadcasting Reinventing Plan of the United States Information Agency is implemented.

action.text: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Smith (NJ) to the Skaggs amendment (A028).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 285 - 139 (Roll no. 582).
